DataElement.preferredName: NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2011 Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Past Week Distress over Physical Problem with Mouth Sores Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how distressed they have been during the past week over physical problems with mouth sores, using a yes or no indicator.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2011 Distress Management Problem List Screening Tool Past Week Distress over Physical Problem with Mouth Sores
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient problems in five categories._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's distress related to their physical problems with mouth sores.
